channel.title: Fixing this?
channel.description:
After re-adding the 'Killerz' thing to my server I got the following errors,
[code].\src\Client.java:11632: cannot find symbol symbol : class client location: class Client client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; ^ .\src\Client.java:11632: cannot find symbol symbol : class client location: class Client client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; ^ .\src\Client.java:11632: package server does not exist client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; ^ .\src\Client.java:11632: cannot find symbol symbol : variable KillerId location: class Client client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Remember it's this code I was trying to add..
[code]client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];[/code]

item.title: Fixing this?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Your Client class has a capital C… You’re trying to declare it with a lowecase c.

Client != client.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing this?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

The compiler speaks English. Read it.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing this?
